desc: The Sit/Stand solution for cubical, Home Office, or industrial settings. Made in the USA, the Kangaroo line is built with high quality materials and workmanship. Built to last and function without issue. Whether you're working from home or stuck in the office the Kangaroo is for you! Don't just sit there, also stand!

layout.text: ErgoDesktop Home of the Kangaroo Adjustable Height Desktop

Sit or Stand during the workday promoting a healthy work life balance
Orders are shipping in 1-3 business days
